price: Ẹ má da irọ́ pọ̀ mọ́ òdodo, ẹ sì má fi òdodo pamọ́ nígbà tí ẹ̀yin mọ (òdodo).
arabic: وَلَا تَلۡبِسُواْ ٱلۡحَقَّ بِٱلۡبَٰطِلِ وَتَكۡتُمُواْ ٱلۡحَقَّ وَأَنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: walā talbisū al-ḥaqa bil-bāṭili wataktumū al-ḥaqa wa-antum taʿlamūna
